title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based English Reading Comprehension and Learning Engagement Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will improve the accuracy of reading English science texts by 30% over five weeks using flipped learning and peer instruction
Learners will increase engagement by participating in weekly online discussions at ≥80% frequency and exchanging peer feedback
Learners will acquire skills in summarizing and analyzing scientific abstracts through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
